com.tozny.e3db

Class LocalRecord

  • Object
    • com.tozny.e3db.LocalRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Record, Signable, SignedDocument<Record>

    public class LocalRecord
extends Object
implements Record
    Represents an E3DB record.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      LocalRecord(Map<String,String> data, RecordMeta meta)
      Creates a representation of a Record suitable for signing or storing locally..

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalRecord

        public LocalRecord(Map<String,String> data,
                   RecordMeta meta)
        Creates a representation of a Record suitable for signing or storing locally..
        Parameters:
        data - Data contained in the record.
        meta - Data about the record. Consider using LocalMeta.

      • LocalRecord

        public LocalRecord(Map<String,String> data,
                   RecordMeta meta,
                   String signature)
        Creates a record with an associated signature.
        Parameters:
        data - Data contained in the record.
        meta - Data about the record. Consider using LocalMeta.
        signature - Signature bytes, as a Base64URL encoded string.

    • Method Detail

      • meta

        public RecordMeta meta()
        Description copied from interface: Record
        Information about the record. Includes items such as writer (RecordMeta.writerId()), creation date (RecordMeta.created(), type (RecordMeta.type()), etc.
        Specified by:

      • signature

        public String signature()
        Description copied from interface: Record
        The signature associated with the document. Can be null, and if so, indicates no signature was ever associated with the document.

        Otherwise, the presence of a signature indicates the document has been verified against the signature.

        Specified by:
        signature in interface Record
        Specified by:
        signature in interface SignedDocument<Record>
        Returns:
        Base64URL-encoded representation of the document signature.

      • document

        public Record document()
        Description copied from interface: SignedDocument
        Returns the original document from which SignedDocument.signature() is derived.
        Specified by:
        document in interface SignedDocument<Record>
        Returns:
        document.

      • toSerialized

        public String toSerialized()
        Description copied from interface: Signable
        A string representing the contents of the document. The value produced must always identical for documents that are the "same."
        Specified by:
        toSerialized in interface Signable
        Returns:
        A string representing the document.
